info.author: Ben Hayden
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Now procrastination is even easier.
Headlines scroll on your desktop, without any window decoration at all.
Click on a headline or feed title to open it in firefox. [Change BROWSER_COMMAND
in the rc file to use Opera or Grail or links or lynx...]
info.keywords: rss feedparser xlib transparent clear text aggregator
info.name: RssPanel
info.summary: This *nix-only RSS aggregator can be made transparent. Requires Xlib, imlib2, and feedparser.
info.html_description: Now procrastination is even easier. Headlines scroll on your desktop, without any window decoration at all. Click on a headline or feed title to open it in firefox. [Change BROWSER_COMMAND in the rc file to use Opera or Grail or links or lynx…]
